Pre-Game Insights: Colombia begins their 2024 Copa America campaign on a 23-match unbeaten run, most recently defeating Bolivia 3-0.
Paraguay won their previous encounter 1-0 over Panama.
Colombia has not lost an international match in over two years, with their last defeat being to Argentina in February 2022.
Colombia is on an eight-match winning run, outscoring their 2024 opponents by a combined margin of 12-3.
Colombia have not been behind for a single minute in their four matches played this year and have won six successive encounters when scoring first.
Colombia have come back to win their previous three encounters when conceding the opening goal.
Paraguay have something to build on heading into this tournament, winning their final tune-up fixture, which was their first victory of 2024.
Paraguay have emerged victorious the last three times that they have found the back of the net while failing to concede.
Colombia have won their opening match in each of the last three editions of the Copa America.
Paraguay have not won a Copa America match against Colombia since 2007 (5-0).
